summary: This document is an email exchange between Lesley Groff and Paul Morris regarding an appointment with Jeffrey Epstein. Lesley informs Paul that Jeffrey is available to meet the following week and suggests a specific date and time for the meeting.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating an appointment for Paul Morris to meet with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank and is trying to schedule a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the individual with whom Paul Morris is trying to schedule a meeting.

connections.description: Lesley Groff is assisting Paul Morris in scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
Paul Morris is attempting to meet with Jeffrey Epstein for a discussion.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting
events.description: Paul Morris is scheduled to meet with Jeffrey Epstein at Epstein's home.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff cancels an appointment for Paul Morris with Jeffrey Epstein originally scheduled for January 16, 2013.
Jeffrey Epstein is available to meet Paul Morris on January 22, 2013, at 4:30 or 5:00 PM.
Paul Morris is identified as a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank Asset & Wealth Management.
